title: HarperCollins Workers Strike for Better Pay and Benefits
description: Employees say they’ll not return to work until they have a new contract. The company says it will “continue to negotiate in good faith.”
dc:creator: Alexandra Alter and Elizabeth A. Harris
media:credit: Benjamin Norman for The New York Times
media:description: Workers at HarperCollins staged a one-day strike in July. This time, they are striking indefinitely.
